PositiveAmount.description:
Number of monetary units where the size of the decimal part is defined by the currency.
Note: 
total number of digits: 21
number of digits in fractional part: 8
maxInclusive: 9999999999999.99999999
minInclusive: 0

LoanCollateralLien.description: Legal claim against a piece of property. It represents a debt, which the lender can enforce by taking legal action against the property.
